text: Muthurayana Hosahalli Kaval is a small village in Mysore district of Karnataka state, India. Muthrani Hosyana Kaval ==Location== Muthurayana Hosahalli Kaval is located on the Mysore—Virajpet road, 10 km from Hunsur. https://www.google.com/maps/dir/@12.2941306,76.2273767,15z/data=!4m4!1m3!3m2!1s0x3ba5852336b9dca7:0xc55ee22e81c1122c!2sHunsur,+Karnataka+571105,+India ==Demographics== According to 2011 census, this village has a total population of 1,558 people. There are 349 houses in the village. https://villageinfo.in/karnataka/mysore/hunsur/muthurayana-hosahalli.html ==Villages and Suburbs== * Hulaganahalli * Vadlimanuganahalli * Kallahallikaval * Angatahalli * Ramenahalli * Chennasoge * Hosakote ==Festivals== Yugadi, Dussehra, Makar Sankranti, Karaga, Hampi Utsava (festival), Hoysala Mahotsava (celebration), Vairamudi, Tula Sankramana, Diwali, Eid-ul-Adha, Muharram, Eid-ul-Fitr are the major festivals celebrated in Muthurayana Hosahalli. ==Economy== Rice, ragi, jowar, maize, pulses, oilseeds, cashews, coconut, arecanut, cardamom, chillies, cotton, sugarcane and tobacco are the major crops that are cultivated mostly in the area.http://www.sindhindia.com/p/karnataka/mysore/hunsur/muthurayana- hosahalli/ ==References== Category:Villages in Mysore district
title: Muthurayana Hosahalli Kaval
